allowModSwearingExplain:
Skip filtering mods for vulgar language
Disable this if streaming or recording
autosaveNote: Note: Changes will be autosaved. You must restart for all changes to take effect
bloodExplain:
Blood
Disable if slow framerate or dislike
chunkCullPerFrame:
Chunk cull per frame
(Decrease to reduce stuttering)
chunkCullPerFrameExplain:
This setting effects how many chunks are culled at once.
Lowering it can reduce stuttering but slows down loading.
damageExplain:
Floating damage numbers
Disable if slow framerate
faction_little_known: Little is known about this faction
hover_for_stat_info: Hover over stats to get more information
research_confirm_unlock: Are you sure you want to unlock {name}?
research_must_visit_bench: Please visit a research bench`n with the necessary resources!
research_tip_1: Remember!`nYou must insert research resources into the research bench `nbefore researching`n
research_tip_2: Did you know?`nYou can buy or find more research blueprints which are not`nshown in this list
syncTimingExplain:
This setting effects how code is delayed on the CPU.
Lowering it can help reduce stuttering.
Increasing it can help games with lots of objects.
Recommended Value: 50-200
targetFpsExplain:
This setting forces the max FPS for the renderer.
Lowering may help stabilize FPS
uiScalingExplain:
Increase the scale of the UI for bigger screens
[Current Experimental]
viewportRange:
Viewport Loading Range
(Decrease to reduce stuttering)
viewportRangeExplain:
This setting effects how many chunks are loaded in at once.
Lowering it can reduce stuttering but also introduce black borders
worldZoomLimitsExplain:
Change max and min zoom.
Useful for large or small screens.
Recommended Min: 5, Max: 12
